job.title: REMOTE Lead Site Reliability Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description:
If you are a Lead Site Reliability Engineer with experience, please read on!
Top Reasons to Work with Us
Our mission is to replace classic college-level textbooks, homework, and lab assignments with interactive and animated online textbooks that allow instructors to modify content and monitor student participation/performance. Currently, we are used in over 600 universities by over 4500k students and offer the excitement of a young, energetic startup environment with a masterfully engineered platform and high-demand content for the STEM college market.
What You Will Be Doing
As the Lead Site Reliability Engineer on our team, you will be responsible for creating and owning production infrastructure and services. This infrastructure includes multiple Kubernetes clusters, CI/CD solutions, and deployment of security tooling to protect student data. You will be critical in the scaling of our educational products to hundreds of thousands of students.
Responsibilities
Hands on work with production Kubernetes clusters. Upgrades, deployment, network/configuration, tooling, etc.
Own the infrastructure projects end-end
Build observability into our applications to monitor and self-heal
Work directly with application engineers to support, enhance, and maintain end-to-end CI/CD test driven deployment pipelines.
Improve internal and external security infrastructure, audit trails, etc.
What You Need for this Position
Must Have
BS in related field OR equivalent professional experience
5+ years of site reliability engineering experience in a production Kubernetes environment
Team leadership experience
Programming: Python, Go, or Java
Distributed Systems experience
AWS infrastructure
DevOps tools: docker, terraform, helm
Nice To Have
Infrastructure-as-code
cyber-security experience
What's In It for You
Competitive Salary DOE
Comprehensive Benefits Package
Very Flexible Hours
Generous PTO
401K
Remote work
So, if you are a Lead Site Reliability Engineer with experience, please apply today!
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Kurt.Holzmuller@Optello.com

Kurt Holzmuller - Associate Manager - Optello
